info.title: Bagisto Store Front Rest API Documentation
info.description: Bagisto Store Front Rest API Documentation

get.description: Returns attributes list, if you want to retrieve all attributes at once pass pagination=0 otherwise ignore this parameter
Returns attribute by id
Returns product attribute families, if you want to retrieve all attribute families at once pass pagination=0 otherwise ignore this parameter
Returns attribute family by id
Returns categories, if you want to retrieve all categories at once pass pagination=0 otherwise ignore this parameter
Returns category by id
Returns category product maximum price by id
Returns descendant categories based on the parent category id
Returns products, if you want to retrieve all products at once pass pagination=0 otherwise ignore this parameter
Returns product by id

get.summary: Get product reviews by product id
get.description: Returns product reviews by product id

post.summary: Store product's review by login customer

attachments[].description: Array of attachment files (images or videos)

get.summary: Get product's additional info by product id

get.summary: Get configurable product options by id
get.description: Returns configurable product options by id
Returns channels, if you want to retrieve all channels at once pass pagination=0 otherwise ignore this parameter
Returns channel by id
Returns config list, if you want to retrieve all config records at once pass pagination=0 otherwise ignore this parameter

get.summary: Get core configuration value by code
get.description: Get core configuration value by code
Returns config's record by id
Returns countries, if you want to retrieve all countries at once pass pagination=0 otherwise ignore this parameter
Returns country by id
Returns states using country code
Returns countries with their states
Returns currencies, if you want to retrieve all currencies at once pass pagination=0 otherwise ignore this parameter
Returns currency by id
Returns locales, if you want to retrieve all locals at once pass pagination=0 otherwise ignore this parameter
Returns shop locale by id

message.example: Your account has been updated  successfully.

value.message: The email has already been taken.

email: The email has already been taken.

get.description: Returns address list, if you want to retrieve all addresses at once pass pagination=0 otherwise ignore this parameter

message.example: Your address has been created successfully.

value.message: The first name field is required.

first_name: The first name field is required.

get.description: Returns customer's address by id

message.example: Your address has been updated successfully.

value.message: The first name field is required.

first_name: The first name field is required.

message.example: You've successfully marked this as your default address.
We have e-mailed your reset password link.
We can't find a user with that e-mail address.

get.description: Returns customer/guest's cart

quantity.description: Enter the quantity wish to add to cart

selected_configurable_option.description: Use in configurable type product only (Required), variant/child product id

super_attribute.description: Use in configurable type product only (Required), variant's attribute & option ids

qty.description: Use in grouped type product only (Required), index used as simple product ID and value is quantity of simple product

links.description: Use in downloadable type product only (Required), value used as link ID

bundle_options.description: Use in bundle type product only (Required), index used as bundle option id & value used as bundle option's product id

bundle_option_qty.description: Use in bundle type product only (Required), value used as bundle option's product quantity

booking.description: Use in booking type product only (Required)

renting_type.description: Use in rental type product only (Required)

qty.description: Use in booking event type product only (Required), index used as event id & value as quantity

note.example: Use this with booking product table

message.example: Item is successfully added to cart.

400.description: Item cannot be added to cart, please try again later!

qty.description: Index used as cart_item_id and value is quantity of the product, Use for all types of product (Required)

400.description: Quantity cannot be lesser than one.

delete.summary: Delete item from cart using cart item id
delete.description: Delete item from cart using cart item id

message.example: Item is successfully removed from the cart.
Item is successfully removed from the cart.

post.summary: Move cart item to customer's wishlist
post.description: Move cart item to customer's wishlist using cart item id

400.description: Quantity cannot be lesser than one.

get.description: Returns a list of GDPR data requests submitted by the logged-in customer. Supports pagination and sorting.

post.description: Create GDPR Request for Logged-in Customer

message.example: Delete my account and all associated data.
Your GDPR Request has been created successfully.

get.summary: Get GDPR Request Details by ID for Logged-in Customer
get.description: Returns detailed information of a specific GDPR data request identified by ID for the logged-in customer.

put.description: Revokes a pending GDPR data request for the logged-in customer by ID

message.example: Your GDPR request has been revoked successfully.

404.description: GDPR request not found or cannot be revoked

get.summary: Get Order's invoices of logged in customer
get.description: Returns order's invoices list, if you want to retrieve all order's invoices at once pass pagination=0 otherwise ignore this parameter

get.summary: Get Order's invoice detail by id for logged in customer
get.description: Returns order's invoice detail by id for logged in customer

message.example: You have successfully subscribed to our newsletter.

get.description: Returns order list, if you want to retrieve all orders at once pass pagination=0 otherwise ignore this parameter
Returns customer's order by id
This endpoint adds order items to the customer's cart for reordering. After successfully adding items to the cart, the customer should proceed with the checkout process via the checkout APIs.

message.example: Oops! The page you're looking for is on vacation. It seems we couldn't find what you were searching for.

get.summary: Get Order's shipments of logged in customer
get.description: Returns order's shipments list, if you want to retrieve all order's shipments at once pass pagination=0 otherwise ignore this parameter

get.summary: Get Order's shipment detail by id for logged in customer
get.description: Returns order's shipment detail by id for logged in customer

get.summary: Get Order's transactions of logged in customer
get.description: Returns order's transactions list, if you want to retrieve all order's transactions at once pass pagination=0 otherwise ignore this parameter

get.summary: Get Order's transaction detail by id for logged in customer
get.description: Returns order's transaction detail by id for logged in customer
Returns customer's wishlists

post.description: Add or Remove product to customer's wishlist

post.summary: Move product from wishlist to cart
post.description: The quantity field is used to specify the number of items to add or update in the cart. If omitted, a default quantity of 1 will be assumed.

delete.description: Delete all wishlists items to the customer.

event_date.description: Event date, Info: this property will only use with event type booking product.

boolean_value.description: Boolean type attribute value i.e. Guest Checkout

break_time.description: Break time after each booking slot

same_slot_all_days.description: Same slot all days(null => yes & 0 => no), i.e same slots for all days or different slots for each days.

break_time.title: Break Time
break_time.description: Break time after each booking slot

from_day.description: Day's number, Only use with one booking_type

to_day.description: Day's number, Only use with one booking_type

special_price.description: Ticket's special price, Only use if special_price is applied to ticket booking
